channel.title: Comments on: Review: Seeing Berlin Through The Homeless
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: snookerinberlin
item.dc:creator: snookerinberlin
item.description: Excellent write up about an often misunderstood topic. After reading your write-up, I think that I would also like to take one of these tours.
item.content:encoded:
Excellent write up about an often misunderstood topic.
After reading your write-up, I think that I would also like to take one of these tours.
